Welcome to Auntie Boo Crafts!
I'm passionate about creating handcrafted and personalized items. I specialize in bookmarks, hair clips, glitter pens, key chains, and badge reels. I have something for every price point. Almost all items can be customized. I love working with customers to create something unique and personal.
